src:
Boxeo: se suspendió el Nacional en San Juan

02 Nov 2019, 00:08

Ayer jueves, la Federación Sanjuanina de Boxeo dio a conocer la suspensión del Torneo Nacionales Mayores y Juveniles, que tendría lugar desde el domingo próximo y que iba a tener a tres catamarqueños compitiendo.
La Federación Sanjuanina anunció la suspensión del evento que se iba a desarrollar en el Parque Provincial de la ciudad de Rawson y que recibiría a más de 250 púgiles.
El breve comunicado indica: “La Federación Sanjuanina de Boxeo lamenta informar que ha debido suspender la realización de los Torneos Nacionales Mayores y Juveniles. Se iba a realizar en la provincia de San Juan, del 1 al 9 de noviembre, conjuntamente con el Nacional Femenino, en el estadio ‘Aldo Cantoni’ de la capital sanjuanina”.
“Rogamos sepan entender la difícil decisión que hemos debido tomar, situación que no hemos podido solucionar a pesar de los mayores esfuerzos e intentos realizados hasta minutos antes de las 14.00 del día de la fecha”.
Por Catamarca iban a participar Alexis Apaza (hasta 49 kg), Josué “Mojarrita” Agüero (hasta 60 kg), y Braian Carrizo (hasta 75 kg), quienes se coronaron campeones la semana en el Torneo Regional que se realizó en la provincia de La Rioja.
text:
Boxing: the National was suspended in San Juan

02 Nov 2019, 00:08

Yesterday Thursday, the San Juan Federation of Boxing announced the suspension of the Major and Youth National Tournament, which would take place from next Sunday and was going to have three Catamarque competing.
The San Juan Federation announced the suspension of the event that was going to take place in the Provincial Park of the city of Rawson and that would receive more than 250 boxers.
The brief statement states: “The San Juan Boxing Federation regrets to report that it has had to suspend the realization of the Major and Youth National Tournaments. It was going to take place in the province of San Juan, from November 1 to 9, together with the Women's National, at the ‘Aldo Cantoni’ stadium in the capital of San Juan. ”
"Please know how to understand the difficult decision that we have had to take, a situation that we have not been able to solve despite the greatest efforts and attempts made until minutes before 2:00 p.m. on the date."
For Catamarca, Alexis Apaza (up to 49 kg), Josué “Mojarrita” Agüero (up to 60 kg), and Braian Carrizo (up to 75 kg), who were crowned champions in the Regional Tournament held in the province of The Rioja.
